title: Offers
pleaseKeepScreenOpen: Please keep this modal open until transaction completes to ensure successful transfer of your NFT.
declineDescription: Are you sure to decline this offer?
cancelDescription: Are you sure to cancel this offer?
wrongNetworkWarning: Please make sure to use the correct RPC Settings on Metamask.
connectWalletMarketplace: Please Connect Wallet to view and collect amazing NFTs.
updatePriceLabel: Updating the price will cost Gas Fee.
somethingWentWrongPrice: Something went wrong, we could not save the price. Please try again.
somethingWentWrongPriceUpdate: Something went wrong, we could not update the price. Please try again.
somethingWentWrongOfferRemoval: Something went wrong, we could not remove the offer. Please try again.
somethingWentWrongOfferCreation: Something went wrong, we could not create the offer. Please try again.
priceSuccess: The NFT is successfully posted to the marketplace
priceUpdateSuccess: The price of the NFT is successfully updated.
offerCreateSuccess: The offer is successfully created in the marketplace.
offerRemoveSuccess: The offer is successfully removed from the marketplace.
allowTransactionFromMetaMask: An error occurred during the transaction. Please try again
endDateLabel: Your auction will automatically end at this time and the highest bidder will win & NFT will be transferred to the highest bidder.
emptyListMessage: No NFTs found. Please come back later to view & collect amazing NFTs
fetchErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again later to view & collect amazing Nfts
